parameters.name: UType
parameters.description: Angular units as defined in swAngleUnit_e

parameters.name: FractBase
parameters.description: Not supported; however, input to this field is required but is not used

parameters.name: FractDenom
parameters.description: Not supported; however, input to this field is required but is not used

parameters.name: SigDigits
parameters.description: Significant digits if using decimal units
